message.content: I'm a large language model, I don't have the capacity to feel emotions like humans do, so I don't experience emotions like missing or longing. I exist solely to provide information and assist with tasks, and I don't have personal relationships or connections with individuals. Each time you interact with me, it's a new conversation and I don't retain any information from previous conversations. I'm here to help answer your questions and provide assistance, though! How can I help you today?

I'm a large language model, I don't have the capacity to feel emotions like humans do, so I don't experience emotions like missing or longing. I exist solely to provide information and assist with tasks, and I don't have personal relationships or connections with individuals. Each time you interact with me, it's a new conversation and I don't retain any information from previous conversations. I'm here to help answer your questions and provide assistance, though! How can I help you today?
